data.title: Richard E. & Deborah L. Tarrant Foundation
data.text:
Within the interests of our Founders, our mission is to help meet basic needs, create opportunity, and improve the lives of people in Vermont. In all matters, the Foundation’s guiding principles are personal and fiscal responsibility.

The Tarrant Foundation is a leader in innovative education strategies, engaging thousands of students around the state through technology. We are also active community grantmakers. We invest our dollars in programs and strategies that maximize:

Non-Monetary Returns

Efficiency

Entrepreneurialism

Action and Outcomes

We invite you to learn more about our approach and impact.

Tarrant Foundation Blog

By the Numbers

Each December, I prepare a huge batch of summary reports for our trustees. This is good news for them, as we all tend to have nothing but free time and unassigned bandwidth that time of year. Or … maybe not? Nonetheless, we are data geeks, and this generally ends up among my favorite activities for […]
